quote: “Want to keep Christ in Christmas? Feed the hungry, clothe the naked, forgive the guilty, welcome the unwanted, care for the ill, love your enemies, and do unto others as you would have done unto you.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “I know because I read...Your mind is not a cage. It's a garden. And it requires cultivating.”
author: Libba Bray

quote: “Gossip is just a tool to distract people who have nothing better to do from feeling jealous of those few of us still remaining with noble hearts.”
author: Anna Godbersen

quote: “It’s strange how dreams get under your skin and give your heart a test for what’s real and what’s imaginary.”
author: Jason Mraz

quote: “Drink your tea slowly and reverently, as if it is the axis on which the world earth revolves - slowly, evenly, without rushing toward the future.”
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: “Just because someone desires you, it does not mean that they value you.Read it over.Again.Let those words resonate in your mind.”
author: Nayyirah Waheed

quote: “Would you rather live one perfect day over and over or live your life with no perfect days but just decent ones?”
author: Jenny Han

quote: “Here is a rule to remember in future, when anything tempts you to feel bitter: not "This is misfortune," but "To bear this worthily is good fortune.”
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: “I believe in God, only I spell it Nature.”
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: “Don't limit a child to your own learning, for she was born in another time.”
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: “How much time he gains who does not look to see what his neighbour says or does or thinks, but only at what he does himself, to make it just and holy.”
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: “Consistency is the true foundation of trust. Either keep your promises or do not make them.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.”
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: “Shine your light and make a positive impact on the world; there is nothing so honorable as helping improve the lives of others.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “So long as you fight the darkness, you stand in the light.”
author: Sabaa Tahir

quote: “Only the gentle are ever really strong.”
author: James  Dean

quote: “Don't give up the fight,Stand up for your rights.”
author: Bob Marley

quote: “If you can't you must, and if you must you can.”
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: “Chaos is more freedom; in fact, total freedom. But no meaning. I want to be free to act, and I also want my actions to mean something.”
author: Audrey Niffenegger

quote: “First you jump off the cliff and build your wings on the way down.”
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: “One mistake does not have to rule a person's entire life.”
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: “Written words can also sing.”
author: Ngũgĩ wa Thiong’o

quote: “Life teaches us the right path is rarely the easy one.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Stay strong, stay positive, and never give up.”
author: Roy T. Bennett
